description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
zoo in which the study was conducted – berlin / dortmund / leipzig

condition in which the two presented objects differ – colour (green / red) / shape (cuboid / spherical) / texture (hard / soft). Note that we had to exclude all sessions with soft objects in the colour and shape condition because the apes unwrapped the objects
total duration the ape touched the object with any part of her body [in sec]

proportion of touching the object calculated by summing the durations for both objects within a session and then determining each objects proportion relative to the total – this is independent of session length
duration of the trial (one trial or session was conducted per day) [in sec]/ 300 seconds or until a soft object was unwrapped/ max. 300 seconds or until a soft object was unwrapped
total number of applied manipulations (see paper)

proportion of manipulating the object – calculated by summing the number of manipulations for both objects within a session and then determining each objects proportional manipulation time relative to the total – this is independent of the total number of manipulations
